assistcards.display: Your kobold ally distracts your foe with a pointy spear, making it easier for you to aim.
assistcards.help:
Distracting Spear

Grants your attacks this round +2 Accuracy, helping avoid misses and score critical hit multipliers.

assistcards.display: Your kobold ally readies to deflect with their spear.
assistcards.help:
nDeflecting Spear

40% to deflect an incoming attack, independant your own.
assistcards.allydeflecttext: Your kobold knocked a blow aside with its spear!

workercard.cardlines:
Kobold
Work Rating: 1
Security Rating: 1
Darkvision: +/- 1
Mining bonus +1
Upkeep: 1 nutrition
(Omnivore)
workercard.help:
Kobolds are small, numerous, and reliable workers, well suited to the underground.
Darkvision: Get a bonus to work and security in dark times/places, and a penalty in bright times/places.
Omnivore: kobolds can eat anything.
